gw.api.tree

Class TreeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.tree.TreeUtil

  • public class TreeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for recursively sorting nodes within tree nodes.
    Author:
    bchang

        public static TreeNode findNode(TreeNode startNode,
                java.lang.Object data)
        Searches a node and its subnodes for a given Object.
        Parameters:
        startNode - the root node from which to begin
        data - the Object to search for
        Returns:
        the first TreeNode found containing the Object, or null if it can't be found
